30 
31 /*
32  * delta.c -- Generate in streaming mode an rsync delta given a set of
33  * signatures, and a new file.
34  *
35  * The size of blocks for signature generation is determined by the
36  * block size in the incoming signature.
37  *
38  * To calculate a signature, we need to be able to see at least one
39  * block of the new file at a time. Once we have that, we calculate
40  * its weak signature, and see if there is any block in the signature
41  * hash table that has the same weak sum. If there is one, then we
42  * also compute the strong sum of the new block, and cross check that.
43  * If they're the same, then we can assume we have a match.
44  *
45  * The final block of the file has to be handled a little differently,
46  * because it may be a short match. Short blocks in the signature
47  * don't include their length -- we just allow for the final short
48  * block of the file to match any block in the signature, and if they
49  * have the same checksum we assume they must have the same length.
50  * Therefore, when we emit a COPY command, we have to send it with a
51  * length that is the same as the block matched, and not the block
52  * length from the signature.
53  */
54 
55 /*
56  * Profiling results as of v1.26, 2001-03-18:
57  *
58  * If everything matches, then we spend almost all our time in
59  * rs_mdfour64 and rs_weak_sum, which is unavoidable and therefore a
60  * good profile.
61  *
62  * If nothing matches, it is not so good.
63  */
64 
65

121 /* used by rdiff, but now redundant */
122 int rs_roll_paranoia = 0;
123 
124 static rs_result rs_delta_s_scan(rs_job_t *job);
125 static rs_result rs_delta_s_flush(rs_job_t *job);
126 static rs_result rs_delta_s_end(rs_job_t *job);
127 void rs_getinput(rs_job_t *job);
128 inline int rs_findmatch(rs_job_t *job, rs_long_t *match_pos, size_t *match_len);
129 inline rs_result rs_appendmatch(rs_job_t *job, rs_long_t match_pos, size_t match_len);
130 inline rs_result rs_appendmiss(rs_job_t *job, size_t miss_len);

132 inline rs_result rs_processmatch(rs_job_t *job);
133 inline rs_result rs_processmiss(rs_job_t *job);
134 
140 static rs_result rs_delta_s_scan(rs_job_t *job)
141 {
142  rs_long_t match_pos;
143  size_t match_len;
144  rs_result result;
145  Rollsum test;
146 
147  rs_job_check(job);
148  /* read the input into the scoop */
149  rs_getinput(job);
150  /* output any pending output from the tube */
151  result=rs_tube_catchup(job);
152  /* while output is not blocked and there is a block of data */
153  while ((result==RS_DONE) &&
154  ((job->scoop_pos + job->block_len) < job->scoop_avail)) {
155  /* check if this block matches */
156  if (rs_findmatch(job,&match_pos,&match_len)) {
157  /* append the match and reset the weak_sum */
158  result=rs_appendmatch(job,match_pos,match_len);
159  RollsumInit(&job->weak_sum);
160  } else {
161  /* rotate the weak_sum and append the miss byte */
162  RollsumRotate(&job->weak_sum,job->scoop_next[job->scoop_pos],
163  job->scoop_next[job->scoop_pos+job->block_len]);
164  result=rs_appendmiss(job,1);
165  if (rs_roll_paranoia) {
166  RollsumInit(&test);
167  RollsumUpdate(&test,job->scoop_next+job->scoop_pos,
168  job->block_len);
169  if (RollsumDigest(&test) != RollsumDigest(&job->weak_sum)) {
170  rs_fatal("mismatch between rolled sum %#x and check %#x",
171  (int)RollsumDigest(&job->weak_sum),
172  (int)RollsumDigest(&test));
173  }
174 
175  }
176  }
177  }
178  /* if we completed OK */
179  if (result==RS_DONE) {
180  /* if we reached eof, we can flush the last fragment */
181  if (job->stream->eof_in) {
182  job->statefn=rs_delta_s_flush;
183  return RS_RUNNING;
184  } else {
185  /* we are blocked waiting for more data */
186  return RS_BLOCKED;
187  }
188  }
189  return result;
190 }
191 
192 
193 static rs_result rs_delta_s_flush(rs_job_t *job)
194 {
195  rs_long_t match_pos;
196  size_t match_len;
197  rs_result result;
198 
199  rs_job_check(job);
200  /* read the input into the scoop */
201  rs_getinput(job);
202  /* output any pending output */
203  result=rs_tube_catchup(job);
204  /* while output is not blocked and there is any remaining data */
205  while ((result==RS_DONE) && (job->scoop_pos < job->scoop_avail)) {
206  /* check if this block matches */
207  if (rs_findmatch(job,&match_pos,&match_len)) {
208  /* append the match and reset the weak_sum */
209  result=rs_appendmatch(job,match_pos,match_len);
210  RollsumInit(&job->weak_sum);
211  } else {
212  /* rollout from weak_sum and append the miss byte */
213  RollsumRollout(&job->weak_sum,job->scoop_next[job->scoop_pos]);
214  rs_trace("block reduced to %d", (int)job->weak_sum.count);
215  result=rs_appendmiss(job,1);
216  }
217  }
218  /* if we are not blocked, flush and set end statefn. */
219  if (result==RS_DONE) {
220  result=rs_appendflush(job);
221  job->statefn=rs_delta_s_end;
222  }
223  if (result==RS_DONE) {
224  return RS_RUNNING;
225  }
226  return result;
227 }
228 
229 
230 static rs_result rs_delta_s_end(rs_job_t *job)
231 {
232  rs_emit_end_cmd(job);
233  return RS_DONE;
234 }
235 
236 
237 void rs_getinput(rs_job_t *job) {
238  size_t len;
239 
240  len=rs_scoop_total_avail(job);
241  if (job->scoop_avail < len) {
242  rs_scoop_input(job,len);
243  }
244 }
245 
246 
257 inline int rs_findmatch(rs_job_t *job, rs_long_t *match_pos, size_t *match_len) {
258  /* calculate the weak_sum if we don't have one */
259  if (job->weak_sum.count == 0) {
260  /* set match_len to min(block_len, scan_avail) */
261  *match_len=job->scoop_avail - job->scoop_pos;
262  if (*match_len > job->block_len) {
263  *match_len = job->block_len;
264  }
265  /* Update the weak_sum */
266  RollsumUpdate(&job->weak_sum,job->scoop_next+job->scoop_pos,*match_len);
267  rs_trace("calculate weak sum from scratch length %d",(int)job->weak_sum.count);
268  } else {
269  /* set the match_len to the weak_sum count */
270  *match_len=job->weak_sum.count;
271  }
272  return rs_search_for_block(RollsumDigest(&job->weak_sum),
273  job->scoop_next+job->scoop_pos,
274  *match_len,
275  job->signature,
276  &job->stats,
277  match_pos);
278 }
279 
280 
284 inline rs_result rs_appendmatch(rs_job_t *job, rs_long_t match_pos, size_t match_len)
285 {
286  rs_result result=RS_DONE;
287 
288  /* if last was a match that can be extended, extend it */
289  if (job->basis_len && (job->basis_pos + job->basis_len) == match_pos) {
290  job->basis_len+=match_len;
291  } else {
292  /* else appendflush the last value */
293  result=rs_appendflush(job);
294  /* make this the new match value */
295  job->basis_pos=match_pos;
296  job->basis_len=match_len;
297  }
298  /* increment scoop_pos to point at next unscanned data */
299  job->scoop_pos+=match_len;
300  /* we can only process from the scoop if output is not blocked */
301  if (result==RS_DONE) {
302  /* process the match data off the scoop*/
303  result=rs_processmatch(job);
304  }
305  return result;
306 }
307 
308 
315 inline rs_result rs_appendmiss(rs_job_t *job, size_t miss_len)
316 {
317  rs_result result=RS_DONE;
318 
319  /* if last was a match, or block_len misses, appendflush it */
320  if (job->basis_len || (job->scoop_pos >= rs_outbuflen)) {
321  result=rs_appendflush(job);
322  }
323  /* increment scoop_pos */
324  job->scoop_pos+=miss_len;
325  return result;
326 }
327 
328 
332 inline rs_result rs_appendflush(rs_job_t *job)
333 {
334  /* if last is a match, emit it and reset last by resetting basis_len */
335  if (job->basis_len) {
336  rs_trace("matched " PRINTF_FORMAT_U64 " bytes at " PRINTF_FORMAT_U64 "!",
337  PRINTF_CAST_U64(job->basis_len),
338  PRINTF_CAST_U64(job->basis_pos));
339  rs_emit_copy_cmd(job, job->basis_pos, job->basis_len);
340  job->basis_len=0;
341  return rs_processmatch(job);
342  /* else if last is a miss, emit and process it*/
343  } else if (job->scoop_pos) {
344  rs_trace("got %ld bytes of literal data", (long) job->scoop_pos);
345  rs_emit_literal_cmd(job, job->scoop_pos);
346  return rs_processmiss(job);
347  }
348  /* otherwise, nothing to flush so we are done */
349  return RS_DONE;
350 }
351 
352 
363 inline rs_result rs_processmatch(rs_job_t *job)
364 {
365  job->scoop_avail-=job->scoop_pos;
366  job->scoop_next+=job->scoop_pos;
367  job->scoop_pos=0;
368  return rs_tube_catchup(job);
369 }
370 
385 inline rs_result rs_processmiss(rs_job_t *job)
386 {
387  rs_tube_copy(job, job->scoop_pos);
388  job->scoop_pos=0;
389  return rs_tube_catchup(job);
390 }
391 
392 
397 static rs_result rs_delta_s_slack(rs_job_t *job)
398 {
399  rs_buffers_t * const stream = job->stream;
400  size_t avail = stream->avail_in;
401 
402  if (avail) {
403  rs_trace("emit slack delta for " PRINTF_FORMAT_U64
404  " available bytes", PRINTF_CAST_U64(avail));
405  rs_emit_literal_cmd(job, avail);
406  rs_tube_copy(job, avail);
407  return RS_RUNNING;
408  } else {
409  if (rs_job_input_is_ending(job)) {
410  job->statefn = rs_delta_s_end;
411  return RS_RUNNING;
412  } else {
413  return RS_BLOCKED;
414  }
415  }
416 }
417 
418 
422 static rs_result rs_delta_s_header(rs_job_t *job)
423 {
424  rs_emit_delta_header(job);
425 
426  if (job->block_len) {
427  if (!job->signature) {
428  rs_error("no signature is loaded into the job");
429  return RS_PARAM_ERROR;
430  }
431  job->statefn = rs_delta_s_scan;
432  } else {
433  rs_trace("block length is zero for this delta; "
434  "therefore using slack deltas");
435  job->statefn = rs_delta_s_slack;
436  }
437 
438  return RS_RUNNING;
439 }
440 
441 
445 rs_job_t *rs_delta_begin(rs_signature_t *sig)
446 {
447  rs_job_t *job;
448 
449  job = rs_job_new("delta", rs_delta_s_header);
450  job->signature = sig;
451 
452  RollsumInit(&job->weak_sum);
453 
454  if ((job->block_len = sig->block_len) < 0) {
455  rs_log(RS_LOG_ERR, "unreasonable block_len %d in signature",
456  job->block_len);
457  return NULL;
458  }
459 
460  job->strong_sum_len = sig->strong_sum_len;
461  if (job->strong_sum_len < 0 || job->strong_sum_len > RS_MD4_LENGTH) {
462  rs_log(RS_LOG_ERR, "unreasonable strong_sum_len %d in signature",
463  job->strong_sum_len);
464  return NULL;
465  }
466 
467  return job;
468 }
